trans-unit.source: Throws <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException> when an encoded input byte sequence cannot be converted to a decoded output character.
trans-unit.target: Oppstår <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException>når en sekvens kodede inndataene byte kan ikke konverteres til et dekodede output-tegn.</xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException>

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan arves.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Throws <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException> when the input byte sequence cannot be decoded.
trans-unit.target: Oppstår <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException>når den inngående byte sekvensen kan ikke dekodes.</xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException>

trans-unit.source: The nominal return value is not used.
trans-unit.target: Nominell returverdien brukt ikke.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A> and <xref:System.Text.Decoder.Convert%2A> methods call Fallback if they encounter an unknown byte in their input.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A>og <xref:System.Text.Decoder.Convert%2A>metoder kall basis Hvis det oppstår en ukjent byte i sine inndata.</xref:System.Text.Decoder.Convert%2A> </xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A>

trans-unit.source: In response, the Fallback method always throws <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException> and displays the input data.
trans-unit.target: Svar oppstår alltid metoden Fallback <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException>og viser inndataene.</xref:System.Text.DecoderFallbackException>

trans-unit.source: The Fallback method nominally indicates whether an exception is thrown if an input byte sequence cannot be decoded.
trans-unit.target: Metoden Fallback vanligvis indikerer om et unntak hvis en sekvens med inndata byte ikke kan dekodes.

trans-unit.source: An input array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: En inndata bytematrise.

trans-unit.source: The index position of a byte in the input.
trans-unit.target: Indeksplasseringen av en byte i inndataene.

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: Ingen.

trans-unit.source: No value is returned because the Fallback method always throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Ingen verdi returneres fordi metoden Fallback alltid oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The nominal return value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Nominell er returverdien <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A return value is defined, although it is unchanging, because this method implements an abstract method.
trans-unit.target: En returverdi er definert, selv om det er uendret, fordi denne metoden implementerer en metode som er abstrakt.

trans-unit.source: This method always throws an exception that reports the value and index position of the input byte that cannot be decoded.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppstår alltid det et unntak som rapporterer verdien og indeksen posisjonen for den angitte byten ikke kan dekodes.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the next character in the exception data buffer.
trans-unit.target: Henter det neste tegnet i databufferen unntak.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer> has no actual exception data buffer, the GetNextChar method always returns the Unicode NULL character.
trans-unit.target: Fordi <xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer>har ingen faktiske unntak databufferen metoden GetNextChar returnerer alltid NULL Unicode-tegn.</xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer>

trans-unit.source: The return value is always the Unicode character NULL (U+0000).
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte verdien er alltid Unicode-tegn NULL (U +&0000;).

trans-unit.source: A return value is defined, although it is unchanging, because this method implements an abstract method.
trans-unit.target: En returverdi er definert, selv om det er uendret, fordi denne metoden implementerer en metode som er abstrakt.

trans-unit.source: Causes the next call to <xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*> to access the exception data buffer character position that is prior to the current position.
trans-unit.target: Gjør at neste kall til <xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*>tilgang unntak data buffer tegnposisjonen som før gjeldende posisjon.</xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer.GetNextChar*>

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer> has no actual exception data buffer, the MovePrevious method always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Fordi <xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer>har ingen faktiske unntak databufferen metoden MovePrevious returnerer alltid `false`.</xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer>

trans-unit.source: The return value is always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte verdien er alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A return value is defined, although it is unchanging, because this method implements an abstract method.
trans-unit.target: En returverdi er definert, selv om det er uendret, fordi denne metoden implementerer en metode som er abstrakt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of characters in the current <xref href="System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer"></xref> object that remain to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Henter antallet tegn i gjeldende <xref href="System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer"> </xref> objekt som fortsatt behandles.

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer> has no actual exception data buffer, the Remaining property always returns zero.
trans-unit.target: Fordi <xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer>har ingen faktiske unntak databufferen gjenstående alltid returneres null.</xref:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallbackBuffer>

trans-unit.source: The return value is always zero.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres er alltid null.

trans-unit.source: A return value is defined, although it is unchanging, because this method implements an abstract method.
trans-unit.target: En returverdi er definert, selv om det er uendret, fordi denne metoden implementerer en metode som er abstrakt.
